name: The Paint - Demo
description:
The Paint is an artistic platformer where the player controls a bunny to reach the exits traversing diverse environments and overcoming unique obstacles. Paint your own way forward through the beautiful scenery.

Game features:

- Paint your own way through the maps

- Original relaxing soundtracks

- Beautiful artistic elements

- Discover an untold story through your journey

- Multiple levels of difficulty for both the casual gamer and those who enjoy a challenge

- Graphics settings for lower end PCs

Notes:

This demo features 2 environments - the tutorial maps (2) and the docks (4) for 6 levels total 

The timer is currently not implemented in the demo. 

By playing the game you are agreeing to the EULA attached in the downloads section (standard stuff)
